Who am i

About me

Divya Mathur

Fullstack web developer

Hi, I'm Divya, a web developer striving to create faster and more accessible web experiences. I specialize in building web applications with a mobile first RWD within the Javascript ecosystem. I take interest in how technologies work under the hood and dig deeper to learn more.

Currently, I'm learning about the development of lightweight, scalable applications that rely largely on vanilla Javascript.

Journal Application
